    public partial class Equilateral : MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.Triangle, IEquilateral, IEquatable<Equilateral>
    {
        // Derived entities: 0

        private const long BlockStructureCode = 16387L;
        private const int ClassHeight = 3;
        private const int BlockLength = 8;
        private readonly Memory<byte> _writableLocalBlock;
        private readonly ReadOnlyMemory<byte> _readonlyLocalBlock;

        private static readonly BlockHeader _header = BlockHeader.CreateNew(3, BlockStructureCode);

        public new static Equilateral CreateFrom(Equilateral source)
        {
            if (source.IsFrozen) return source;
            return source switch
            {
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.Equilateral(source)
            };
        }

        public new static Equilateral CreateFrom(MyOrg.Models.IEquilateral source)
        {
            if (source is Equilateral concrete && concrete.IsFrozen) return concrete;
            return source switch
            {
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.Equilateral(source)
            };
        }

        public new static Equilateral CreateFrom(ReadOnlySequence<byte> buffers)
        {
            SourceBlocks blocks = SourceBlocks.ParseFrom(buffers);
            return blocks.Header.EntityId switch
            {
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.Equilateral(blocks)
            };
        }

        protected override int OnGetEntityId() => 3;
        protected override int OnGetClassHeight() => ClassHeight;
        protected override ReadOnlySequenceBuilder<byte> OnSequenceBuilder(ReadOnlySequenceBuilder<byte> builder) => base.OnSequenceBuilder(builder).Append(_readonlyLocalBlock);
        protected override IEntityBase OnPartCopy() => new Equilateral(this);

        protected override void OnFreeze()
        {
            base.OnFreeze();
        }

        protected override async ValueTask OnPack(IDataStore dataStore)
        {
            await base.OnPack(dataStore);
        }

        protected override async ValueTask OnUnpack(IDataStore dataStore, int depth)
        {
            await base.OnUnpack(dataStore, depth);
        }

        // -------------------- field map -----------------------------
        //  Seq.  Off.  Len.  N.    Type    End.  Name
        //  ----  ----  ----  ----  ------- ----  -------
        //     1     0     8        Double  LE    Length

        protected Equilateral(BlockHeader header) : base(header)
        {
            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
        }
        public Equilateral() : base(_header)
        {
            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
        }

        protected Equilateral(BlockHeader header, Equilateral source) : base(header, source)
        {
            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
            this.Length = source.Length;
        }
        public Equilateral(Equilateral source) : this(_header, source) { }

        protected Equilateral(BlockHeader header, IEquilateral source) : base(header, source)
        {
            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
            this.Length = source.Length;
        }
        public Equilateral(IEquilateral source) : this(_header, source) { }

        protected Equilateral(BlockHeader header, SourceBlocks sourceBlocks) : base(header, sourceBlocks)
        {
            var sourceBlock = sourceBlocks.Blocks.Span[ClassHeight];
            if (sourceBlock.Length < BlockLength)
            {
                // source too small - allocate new
                _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
                sourceBlock.CopyTo(_writableLocalBlock);
            }
            else
            {
                _readonlyLocalBlock = sourceBlock;
                _writableLocalBlock = Memory<byte>.Empty;
            }
        }
        internal Equilateral(SourceBlocks sourceBlocks) : this(_header, sourceBlocks) { }
        public Equilateral(ReadOnlySequence<byte> buffers) : this(_header, SourceBlocks.ParseFrom(buffers)) { }

        public Double Length
        {
            get => Codec_Double_LE.ReadFromSpan(_readonlyLocalBlock.Slice(0, 8).Span);
            set => Codec_Double_LE.WriteToSpan(_writableLocalBlock.Slice(0, 8).Span, IfNotFrozen(value));
        }


        public bool Equals(Equilateral? other)
        {
            if (ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;
            if (other is null) return false;
            if (!base.Equals(other)) return false;
            if (!_readonlyLocalBlock.Span.SequenceEqual(other._readonlyLocalBlock.Span)) return false;
            return true;
        }
        public override bool Equals(object? obj) => obj is Equilateral other && Equals(other);
        public override int GetHashCode() => base.GetHashCode();
        public static bool operator ==(Equilateral? left, Equilateral? right) => left is not null ? left.Equals(right) : (right is null);
        public static bool operator !=(Equilateral? left, Equilateral? right) => left is not null ? !left.Equals(right) : (right is not null);
